description: Google Analytics: Tracks page views, user sessions, demographics, and browsing behavior. Sends data to Google servers.
Google Tag Manager: Container script that loads and manages other tracking scripts. Can inject any third-party code.
Google Ads: Displays targeted advertisements and tracks ad clicks and conversions across the Google ad network.
Google reCAPTCHA Enterprise: Bot detection that also collects behavioral signals and risk scores.
Facebook Pixel: Tracks page visits, button clicks, and conversions. Enables ad retargeting across Facebook/Instagram.
Facebook SDK: Social plugins for likes, shares, and comments. Tracks logged-in Facebook users across the web.
Facebook Tracking Pixel: Image-based tracker for conversion tracking and retargeting.
Microsoft Clarity: Records mouse movements, clicks, and scrolling. Creates session replays and heatmaps.
Microsoft Advertising (Bing Ads): Tracks conversions and enables ad targeting on Microsoft properties.
Amplitude: Product analytics tracking user actions, feature usage, and conversion paths.
Mixpanel: Tracks user events, funnels, and retention. Builds user profiles from behavior data.
Segment: Customer data platform that collects events and routes them to multiple analytics/marketing tools.
Heap Analytics: Auto-captures all user interactions including clicks, form submissions, and page views.
Hotjar: Records mouse movements, clicks, scrolling, and form interactions. Creates session replay videos and heatmaps.
FullStory: Records complete user sessions including clicks, scrolls, and form inputs. Captures DOM snapshots for replay.
Plausible: Privacy-focused analytics. Collects page views without cookies (but still tracks).
Matomo/Piwik: Analytics tracking page views, events, and goals. Data sent to server.
Kissmetrics: Behavioral analytics tracking individual user journeys and conversion funnels.
Woopra: Real-time customer analytics tracking user behavior across devices.
Gauges: Real-time web analytics tracking page views and visitor information.
Chartbeat: Real-time content analytics tracking reader engagement and scroll depth.
Parse.ly: Content analytics tracking article views, engagement, and reader behavior.
Clicky: Real-time analytics tracking visitors, actions, and heatmaps.
StatCounter: Web analytics tracking visits, page views, and visitor details.
Clicky Analytics: Real-time visitor tracking with heatmaps and uptime monitoring.
Simple Analytics: Analytics tracking page views (privacy-focused but still tracking).
Fathom Analytics: Privacy-focused analytics (still collects page view data).
GoatCounter: Simple analytics tracking page views and referrers.
Umami: Self-hosted analytics tracking page views and events.
Splitbee: Analytics and A/B testing tracking user behavior and conversions.
Pirsch: Privacy-friendly analytics tracking page views and events.
Counter.dev: Simple analytics tracking visitor counts and page views.
Mouseflow: Records mouse movements, clicks, scrolls, and keystrokes. Creates session replays and heatmaps.
Lucky Orange: Records sessions, tracks mouse movements, creates heatmaps, and captures form analytics.
Crazy Egg: Creates heatmaps, scrollmaps, and session recordings of user behavior.
LogRocket: Session replay capturing user interactions, network requests, console logs, and Redux state.
Smartlook: Session recording with heatmaps, event tracking, and funnel analysis.
Inspectlet: Session recording capturing mouse movements, scrolls, clicks, and form interactions.
SessionCam: Session replay with heatmaps, form analytics, and struggle detection.
Decibel (Medallia): Session replay and digital experience analytics.
Contentsquare: Digital experience analytics with session replay and zone-based heatmaps.
Glassbox: Session replay capturing every user interaction for experience analytics.
Quantum Metric: Continuous product design capturing sessions and behavioral data.
UXCam: Mobile session recording capturing touches, gestures, and screen recordings.
UserTesting: Records user sessions for UX research and testing.
Userlytics: Remote user testing capturing screen recordings and interactions.
Amazon Advertising: Serves targeted ads and tracks conversions for Amazon\
The Trade Desk: Programmatic advertising platform for real-time ad bidding and cross-device targeting.
Criteo: Retargeting ads based on browsing history. Tracks product views for personalized ad recommendations.
Xandr/AppNexus: Ad exchange for real-time bidding. Tracks user behavior for ad targeting.
Magnite/Rubicon: Ad exchange connecting publishers with advertisers through real-time bidding.
PubMatic: Programmatic advertising platform for ad serving and real-time bidding.
OpenX: Ad exchange for programmatic advertising and real-time bidding.
Bidswitch: Ad exchange routing bids between demand and supply platforms.
Index Exchange: Programmatic advertising marketplace for real-time bidding.
SpotX: Video advertising platform for programmatic ad serving.
SpringServe: Video ad server tracking impressions and engagement.
Yieldmo: Mobile advertising platform tracking ad engagement.
Outbrain: Content recommendation widgets showing sponsored articles based on user interests.
Taboola: Content recommendation platform displaying sponsored links based on browsing behavior.
Sharethrough: Native advertising platform that tracks engagement with sponsored content.
RevContent: Content recommendation network tracking clicks and engagement.
MGID: Native advertising platform serving recommended content based on behavior.
Content.ad: Native advertising network tracking content engagement.
ZergNet: Content recommendation tracking article clicks and engagement.
Teads: Video advertising platform tracking video views and engagement.
JW Player Advertising: Video ad serving and tracking.
Google IMA SDK: Video ad insertion tracking ad views and interactions.
Innovid: Connected TV and video advertising platform.
Extreme Reach: Video ad serving and creative distribution.
MediaMath: Demand-side platform for programmatic ad buying with user tracking.
Amobee (Turn): DSP for cross-channel advertising and audience targeting.
Roku/DataXu: DSP for TV and digital advertising with audience data.
Bidtellect: Native advertising DSP tracking content engagement.
Simpli.fi: Localized programmatic advertising platform.
Basis (Centro): Programmatic advertising platform.
Sovrn: Publisher monetization tracking ad impressions and revenue.
RhythmOne/Unruly: Video advertising SSP tracking engagement.
FreeWheel: Video ad management platform for publishers.
Smart AdServer: Ad serving platform tracking impressions and clicks.
GumGum: Contextual advertising using computer vision to analyze page content.
33Across: Attention-based advertising measuring viewability.
TripleLift: Native programmatic advertising platform.
Kargo: Mobile advertising platform tracking ad engagement.
Nativo: Native advertising platform tracking content performance.
Moat (Oracle): Ad verification measuring viewability, attention, and brand safety.
DoubleVerify: Ad verification tracking viewability, fraud, and brand safety.
Integral Ad Science: Ad verification measuring viewability and brand safety.
Meetrics: Ad verification tracking viewability in European markets.
Adloox: Ad verification for fraud prevention and viewability.
Comscore: Digital measurement tracking audiences, ads, and content consumption.
Nielsen: Audience measurement tracking media consumption and demographics.
AdRoll: Retargeting platform tracking site visitors for ad targeting across the web.
Perfect Audience: Retargeting platform tracking users for display and social ads.
SteelHouse: Retargeting and performance advertising platform.
ReTargeter: Display retargeting tracking site visitors.
Fetchback: Retargeting platform for display advertising.
Triggit: Retargeting and social advertising platform.
TikTok Pixel: Tracks user actions for ad attribution and retargeting on TikTok platform.
LinkedIn Insight Tag: Tracks page visits and conversions. Enables B2B ad targeting based on company and job data.
LinkedIn Ads: Conversion tracking for LinkedIn advertising campaigns.
Twitter/X Tracking: Tracks page visits and conversions for Twitter\
Snapchat Pixel: Tracks conversions and enables retargeting on Snapchat.
Instagram Embeds: Displays Instagram content while sending viewing data to Meta.
Pinterest Tag: Tracks page visits and conversions for Pinterest advertising.
Reddit Pixel: Tracks conversions for Reddit advertising campaigns.
Quora Pixel: Tracks conversions for Quora advertising.
AddThis: Social sharing buttons that track user behavior across sites for ad targeting.
ShareThis: Social sharing buttons with cross-site tracking for audience insights.
AddToAny: Social sharing buttons tracking share events and referrals.
Sumo: Email capture and social sharing tools tracking visitor behavior.
mParticle: Customer data platform collecting and routing user data to marketing tools.
RudderStack: Customer data platform collecting events and syncing to warehouses.
Tealium: Tag management and customer data platform collecting user data.
Ensighten: Tag management platform controlling third-party tracking scripts.
Signal: Customer identity platform tracking users across channels.
Lytics: Customer data platform building profiles from behavioral data.
BlueConic: Customer data platform creating unified profiles from interactions.
Zaius (Optimizely): B2C customer data platform tracking purchase behavior.
Treasure Data: Enterprise customer data platform aggregating user data.
Oracle BlueKai: Data management platform for audience targeting.
Salesforce DMP (Krux): Data management platform for audience segmentation.
Lotame: Data management platform for audience data and targeting.
Eyeota: Audience data marketplace for ad targeting.
Bombora: B2B intent data tracking business research behavior.
Clearbit: B2B data enrichment identifying visitors by company.
Demandbase: B2B account identification tracking company visitors.
6sense: B2B intent data tracking buyer research signals.
ZoomInfo: B2B data platform tracking company and contact information.
Leadfeeder: B2B lead generation identifying companies visiting your site.
Albacross: B2B lead generation tracking company visitors.
HubSpot: Marketing automation tracking page views, form submissions, and email engagement.
Marketo: Marketing automation tracking web activity and email engagement for lead scoring.
Pardot (Salesforce): B2B marketing automation tracking visitor behavior and email engagement.
Oracle Eloqua: Marketing automation tracking digital body language across channels.
Act-On: Marketing automation tracking website visits and email engagement.
Mailchimp: Email marketing tracking opens, clicks, and website activity.
Klaviyo: E-commerce email marketing tracking purchase behavior and browsing.
Brevo (Sendinblue): Email marketing tracking opens, clicks, and site activity.
Constant Contact: Email marketing tracking engagement metrics.
ActiveCampaign: Marketing automation tracking email and site behavior.
Drip: E-commerce marketing automation tracking customer behavior.
GetResponse: Email marketing tracking engagement and conversions.
ConvertKit: Creator email marketing tracking subscriber behavior.
AWeber: Email marketing tracking opens, clicks, and engagement.
Keap (Infusionsoft): CRM and marketing automation tracking contacts.
Ontraport: Marketing automation tracking leads and customer behavior.
SharpSpring: Marketing automation tracking web and email engagement.
Customer.io: Messaging platform tracking user behavior for triggered campaigns.
Iterable: Cross-channel marketing tracking user engagement.
Braze: Customer engagement platform tracking behavior across channels.
Leanplum: Mobile marketing automation tracking in-app behavior.
OneSignal: Push notification service tracking user engagement and devices.
Pushwoosh: Push notifications tracking user engagement and device tokens.
Airship: Mobile engagement tracking push notifications and in-app behavior.

Cookiebot: Cookie consent platform scanning cookies and logging consent decisions.
TrustArc: Privacy compliance platform managing and logging consent preferences.
